speakers.name: Precht
speakers.title: Trainer at @thoughtram, GDE
speakers.description: Pascal is a front-end engineer and an Angular Developer Expert nominated by Google. He created the angular-translate module, is an Angular 2 contributor and also part of the Angular 2 Docs Authoring team.

speakers.name: Motto
speakers.title: Founder of Ultimate Angular, GDE
speakers.description: JavaScript, Angular, React, conference speaker. Developer Expert at Google, open source lover.

speakers.name: De Ryck
speakers.title: Trainer in Web Security
speakers.description: Philippe De Ryck is a professional speaker and trainer on software security and web security. Since he obtained his PhD at the imec-DistriNet research group (KU Leuven, Belgium), he has been running the group's Web Security Training program, which ensures a sustainable knowledge transfer of the group’s security expertise towards practitioners.

speakers.name: Elm
speakers.title: Trainer at Thoughtram
speakers.description: Dominic is trainer at Thoughtram and co-founder of MachineLabs.

speakers.name: Steyer
speakers.title: Freelance trainer and consultant, GDE
speakers.description: Trainer and Consultant with focus on Angular. Writes for O'Reilly, Hanser, windows.developer and Heise Developer. Regularly speaks at conferences.

speakers.name: Strumpflohner
speakers.title: Software Architect, instructor at Egghead.io
speakers.description: Juri is a Software Architect, JavaScript coder, blogger, instructor at Egghead.io and martial arts practitioner

speakers.name: Knight
speakers.title: Software engineer at Warner Bros.
speakers.description: Aimee is a former figure skater and Angular Air panelist. She is currently working as a software engineer at Warner Bros.

speakers.name: Yönet
speakers.title: Angular consultant at Nrwl.io, GDE
speakers.description: Ayşegül is a Javascript developer focusing on AngularJS and data visualization. She is a Developer Expert at Google, an active conference speaker and recently joined Victor Savkin and Jeff Cross at Nrwl.io.

speakers.name: Hussain
speakers.title: Cloud developer advocate @Microsoft
speakers.description: Asim is a conference speaker, published author, passionate teacher and cloud developer advocate @Microsoft

speakers.name: Shaked
speakers.title: GDE
speakers.description: Uri regularly speaks about Web and IoT-related topics around the world. He works part-time for BlackBerry, maintains several open-source projects and dances Salsa.

speakers.name: Salnikov
speakers.title: Front-end Engineer, GDE
speakers.description: Maxim is a Web front-end engineer from Oslo and a Google Developer Expert in Web technologies & IoT. He is active as a public tech speaker & trainer and founder of Mobile Era & ngVikings.

speakers.name: Ogloblinsky
speakers.title: Front-end Architect
speakers.description: Vincent is a trainer, speaker, father and Front-end Architect from France.
